# Ruby -- XSS exploit of RDoc documentation generated by rdoc
Ruby developers report:

> RDoc documentation generated by rdoc bundled with ruby are vulnerable
> to an XSS exploit. All ruby users are recommended to update ruby to
> newer version which includes security-fixed RDoc. If you are
> publishing RDoc documentation generated by rdoc, you are recommended
> to apply a patch for the documentaion or re-generate it with
> security-fixed RDoc.


## Affected packages
 - **ruby**
    - **Introduced:** 1.9,1
    - **Fixed:** 1.9.3.385,1
 - **rubygem18-rdoc**
    - **Fixed:** 3.12.1
 - **rubygem19-rdoc**
    - **Fixed:** 3.12.1
